description: Adds new Pavilion hero class: Pharaoh. 8 additional units for Pavilion. Based on Bastion from Bastion New Town Group, Pavilion. This mod also adds a few Vizier and Embalmer heroes. Special thanks to: Nephretes, J. M. Sower, Hobbit, Kuririn, Witchking, Trith, Mitlandy, and all Acid Cave community. This version also adds the 'Turn to Stone' effect.
name: New Heroes, Units, and Turn to Stone Effect for Pavilion
author: Kurek, edeksumo, Bastion New Town Group, Maestro
